name: Holiday Showdown: Frosty's Revenge
description:
Welcome !
Currently the game is under serious development yet, but I would like to share it with you near Christmas. Many features and unique models still are not built in , let me excuse for that.
New updates  will come as I can upload it, but i can reveal some future features. 
e.g
-Different game modes ( even team mods , currently there is  only DM) 
- Whole class system and customization
-EXP, credit system (Snow
 - even PvE content will come you have to fight together to defeat the Holiday's Spirits.
- Rework weapon system and core movement

At the moment game can support only 20 players on servers at same time.

Support my game to grow bigger and LET'S CREATE A GREAT COMMUNITY.
